summary: Alpha version of the Dungeon Despise from Ultima 9: Ascension
descriptionHtml:
Alpha version of the Dungeon Despise from Ultima 9: Ascension

Install:
-Put the 3 files (bsa, bsl, esp) into your Skyrim Data Directory (eg: D:\\Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim)
-Activate the Mod in the Skyrim Launcher

Locate the Dungeon:
-Enter the dungeon with the command (activate the console with ^) \"coc ultima9mod_despise\"
-If you want to discover the entrance of the Dungeon, it is in the north of the Honningbrew Meadery in the Whiterun area

5-6 Rooms aren\'t set up.

Each object is translated into German. EV soon!
author: BigSzalay
